Package org.group8.simulator.model

Class HealthCentre

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.group8.simulator.framework.AbstractHealthCentre
org.group8.simulator.model.HealthCentre
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, IHealthCentre
public class HealthCentre extends AbstractHealthCentre
The HealthCentre class models a healthcare center simulation, handling patient flow between various service points, such as check-in, doctor consultation, lab, x-ray, and treatment. It extends AbstractHealthCentre and implements the logic for initializing and processing events in the simulation, as well as gathering and saving statistics.

      public ArrivalProcess createArrivalProcess(String name, EventType eventType)
      Creates an ArrivalProcess for the specified event and associates it with a distribution.
      Parameters:

      eventType - the type of event to generate (e.g., ARR_CHECKIN)
      Returns:
      the created ArrivalProcess
